name: Cranes Media
tagline: We are a full service design agency in Hong Kong.
description: Cranes Media is a Hong Kong based design company. Specialized in branding, identities, packaging, illustrations, graphic design, info graphic, UI, print, publications, and website design. We also provide one-stop solution for offline, online creative campaign design, and event productions.

locations.address: A1412, Sea View Estate 2 Watson Road
